</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 279 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Wooden Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=18)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The magic within this [wooden shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=18) lashes out at your foes as the shield is [destroyed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=46). 

**Activate—Splintering Boom** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))  **Trigger** The exploding shield is destroyed;  **Effect** The shield explodes outward, dealing 4d6 piercing damage to each creature in a 15-foot cone (DC 19 basic Reflex save).
